alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 7:02PM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, and ice accumulations of around one-tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Western Pendleton and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow between 4 and 7 AM. The snow may mix with sleet and freezing rain during the afternoon, before ending during the early evening. The snow may be heavy at times during the afternoon, with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour briefly possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
